A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: Terrible film.  This should be Rian Johnson's last movie\, for he has no business being anywhere in the film industry.  The film is awkwardly paced\, chooses poorly placed\, off-putting humor\, has terrible acting from all involved\, and a plot with so many holes\, the Millennium Falcon should have no issues navigating the gaps\, especially with the Mary Sue pilot Rey at the helm.  Speaking of; Mary Sue\, I mean Rey\, is offered no challenges\, no room for growth.  She has everything handed to her on a silver platter and is in and of herself a Deus Ex Machina plot device.  The SJW themes of rich=bad\, and hurrah purple-haired feminism only helps further sink an already listing ship.
